quote_last: she received a second phone call to let her know the plane had taken off from Amman with the “cargo” on board.
title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: I had arranged to meet the Occupational Health Officer at 10:30. I took the train from Watford Junction at
quote_last: and arrived at London Euston seven minutes late, at 8.49.
title: The Terrible Privacy of Maxwell Sim
author: Jonathan Coe
